doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 20
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 20
COMMERCIAL: Thirteenth Annual Center Garden Party
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."
1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Earth Share, "It's a connected world."

2. Footage of Andy Humm at the Lambda Literary Awards interviewing Bella Abzug, [activist and former politician] and Renee Roth, Manhattan Surrogate Court Judge, regarding the upcoming primary election.
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, National Alliance for Research on Schizophrenia and Depression
4. Footage of Andy Humm at the Lambda Literary Awards interviewing Mark Agrast, Congressional Aide for Gerry Studds, regarding AIDS funding.
COMMERCIAL: Dan Gendron, Horologist, "Stop paying too much for antique watches"
6. Footage of 5th Lesbian and Gay Photo Annual at the Leslie-Lohman Gay Art Foundation.

7. Footage of 1996 Lambda Liberty Awards. Includes footage of Jed Mattes, award recipient/former President of the Board of the Hetrick-Martin Institute; Urvashi Vaid, award recipient/former Director of the National Gay and Lesbian Task Force; and Gerry Studds, award recipient/retiring openly gay Congressman from Massachusetts.
8. Interview: Rick Landman, [activist], discusses his work for the lesbian and gay community and promotes an upcoming commemorative event at the Gay and Lesbian Community Services Center.
COMMERCIAL: The Monster, NYC club and bar
9. Late Breaking News: Lou Maletta discusses same-sex marriage issues.
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 20: 1996
